00014 #ifndef nmrspectrumH
00015 #define nmrspectrumH
00016 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00017 #include <nmrspectrumbase.h>

00019 class XMagnetPS;
00020 class XDMM;
00021 
00022 class Ui_FrmNMRSpectrum;
00023 typedef QForm<QMainWindow, Ui_FrmNMRSpectrum> FrmNMRSpectrum;
00024 
00025 class XNMRSpectrum : public XNMRSpectrumBase<FrmNMRSpectrum>
00026 {
00027     XNODE_OBJECT
00028 protected:
00029     XNMRSpectrum(const char *name, bool runtime,
00030                  const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00031                  const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00032                  const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00033                  const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers);
00034 public:
00035     //! ususally nothing to do
00036     ~XNMRSpectrum() {}
00037 protected:
00038     //! \return true to be cleared.
00039     virtual bool onCondChangedImpl(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &) const;
00040     virtual double getFreqResHint() const;
00041     virtual double getMinFreq() const;
00042     virtual double getMaxFreq() const;
00043     virtual double getCurrentCenterFreq() const;
00044     virtual void getValues(std::vector<double> &values) const;
00045 
00046     virtual bool checkDependencyImpl(const shared_ptr<XDriver> &emitter) const;
00047 public:
00048     const shared_ptr<XItemNode<XDriverList, XMagnetPS, XDMM> > &magnet() const {return m_magnet;}
00049 
00050     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &centerFreq() const {return m_centerFreq;}
00051     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &resolution() const {return m_resolution;}
00052     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &minValue() const {return m_minValue;}
00053     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &maxValue() const {return m_maxValue;}
00054     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &fieldFactor() const {return m_fieldFactor;}
00055     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &residualField() const {return m_residualField;}
00056 private:
00057     const shared_ptr<XItemNode<XDriverList, XMagnetPS, XDMM> > m_magnet;
00058  
00059     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> m_centerFreq;
00060     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> m_resolution;
00061     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> m_minValue, m_maxValue;
00062     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> m_fieldFactor;
00063     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> m_residualField;
00064     xqcon_ptr m_conCenterFreq, m_conResolution, m_conMin, m_conMax,
00065         m_conFieldFactor, m_conResidualField;
00066     xqcon_ptr m_conMagnet;
00067 };
